txt.en: 'I will gather my people now. Come, [placeholder]! I would have you at my side for this.'\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: This is a solo instance, and cannot be completed in a fellowship.</rgb>
Help Agelwyn and her people reach Helm's Deep
Gamling is at Helm's Dike in the south-western Westfold.\n\nYou should speak with Gamling.

'It was good of you to rally those people, [placeholder]! I believe the women will be safe in the Glittering Caves, and the men will be put to good use upon the battlements.\n\n'The lady hopes to see you within, but she said to bid you farewell if you insisted upon going back out into the fray.'
It is time to make for Helm's Deep with Agelwyn and the refugees. You have chosen the safest path, but it will still be dangerous, for the Westfold is overrun.
'I must brace myself for the displeasure of my people....'\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: This is a solo instance, and cannot be completed in a fellowship.</rgb>
Agelwyn is in the ravine north of Marton.\n\nYou should speak with Agelwyn.
